sec.p: The EO was subjected to GC/MS. The chemical composition of the oregano essential oil is given in Table 2. Seventy-seven components of the oil were identified. The major components identified using GC/MS analysis were thymol (20.72%), gamma-terpinene (8.83%), borneol (8.72%), cymene (6.83%), carvacrol (6.274%), alfa-terpinene (5.26%), and sabinene (4.92%).

div.p: GC-MS analyses of Origanum vulgare L. essential oil.
